comment.author: 40259805@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/86529991@N08] Posters aren`t worth much,probably a few bucks,but if you would have a carte de visite,they are worth anywhere from $10 to a few hundred,check out CDV`s on ebay,at the same time search to see if anyone else has the same poster,good luck !
